data.message: How about finding homes for our veterans rather than illegals. Put tax payers first rather than people who are not citizens.

replies.message: love your comment
As a USAF veteran,  I agree.
I completely  agree well said.
Sage, glad to see you finally figured it out honey.  We are talking about Vet's vs "illegals".  Illegals need to go home to their own homes.

The point is there are citizens who are homeless and go without basic needs. We need to take care of our own, then help others, but they need to come here legally.
No need to make it either/or. If we spent a fraction of the war expenditures on veterans, they would be well taken care of.

paranoia strikes deep...into you're mind it will creep.....
Simple if you are ILLEGAL get tf out. People who keep you safe (VETERANS) VS people who take your jobs(ILLEGALS).

Most of what you're asking for is up to Congress. They control the budget.

The President is not nearly as powerful as we make him out to be. They are the single most powerful person in our government, but they are still only representative of one aspect of it. Instead of directing all of our anger at a single person, lets direct it at the entire system that's responsible.
Besides, we have more empty homes than homeless. The problem isn't the President.
